pullrequest.title: Both `ros_control` and `ros_controllers` are metapackages, which a normal Catkin package cannot depend on. So specific non-meta packages need to be used (originally raised in https://goo.gl/TQPui6).

content.raw:
Pulled your branch into this repo, here's the preview:

http://gazebosim.org/tutorials?tut=ros_control&branch=130s/both-ros_control-and-ros_controllers-are-1499828549438

Looks good to me, thanks!
